sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical and electroencephalographic characteristics of automatism.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析癲自動症的臨牀和腦電圖特徵。
好一個癡癲的穴居男人。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the characteristic features of postoperative epilepsy developed after excision of cerebral space-occupying lesion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大腦佔位病竈切除術後患者繼發癲的特點。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the clinical features and the onset mechanism of epilepsy after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦卒中後癲癎的臨牀特點及發病機制。

sentences.english: On the stage, Eric and Kelvin Kwan played madly .
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威與關楚耀在臺上玩到癲。

sentences.english: Objectsive To explore surgical treatment of refractory epilepsy involving in the central sulcus region.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討涉及中央區難治性癲疒間的手術治療。

sentences.english: Conclusion The combination of surgical operations for the treatment of intractable epilepsy is an effective and safe approach.
sentences.chinese: 結論頑固性癲癎的聯合性手術治療療效確切可靠。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical features of early epileptic seizures (EES) after intracerebral hemorrhage (ICH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦出血後早發性癲癎發作的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the photosensitivity among pediatric epileptic patient, and their characters.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究兒童癲與光敏感性的關係。
